Rule.Name: GRLincomingContributionsNotMoreThan100
Rule.Description: Contributions to an intentional element must not sum up to a value higher than 100.

Rule.Name: GRLconditionDependeeOfIE
Rule.Description: A GRL resource with a ST_CONDITIONTYPE medatada must be a dependee of an intentional element
Rule.Constraint: (self.type=IntentionalElementType::Ressource and self.hasMetadata('ST_CONDITIONTYPE')) implies self.linksSrc -> select(link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Dependency)) -> collect(link | link.oclAsType(grl::Dependency)).dest -> select(le | le.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement)) -> size() > 0

Rule.Name: GRLactorNoCLASSTYPE
Rule.Description: ST_CLASSTYPE stereotypes cannot be used on Actors

Rule.Name: GRLconditionNotADepender
Rule.Description: A GRL resource with a ST_CONDITIONTYPE medatada cannot depend on anything else
Rule.Constraint: (self.type=IntentionalElementType::Ressource and self.hasMetadata('ST_CONDITIONTYPE')) implies self.linksDest -> select(link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Dependency)) -> isEmpty()
